description: From Late Latin septennium, from septennis (“7-year”) + -ium (“forming abstract nouns”).

examples: Coordinate terms: annum, biennium, triennium, quadrennium, quinquennium, sexennium, octennium, novennium, decennium, centennium, quincentennium, millennium, decamillennium, centimillennium, millionennium
